      • copyForRelation

        public static Table copyForRelation(Table table)
        Returns a copy of the table suitable to be used in a relation as a related table. Related tables may have different aliases as well as their field may also have different aliases.
        Parameters:
        table - The table to copy.
        Returns:
        The copy of the table to be used in a relation.

      • getSimpleView

        public View getSimpleView()
        Returns a simple view of this table, using the primary key as index.
        Returns:
        The most simple view.

      • getSimpleView

        public View getSimpleView(Order orderBy)
        Returns a simple view of this table, using the argument index as the order by index. No relations are build based on foreign keys.
        Parameters:
        orderBy - The order by index.
        Returns:
        The most simple view.

      • getComplexView

        public View getComplexView(Order orderBy)
        Returns a complex view of this table, using the argument order as the order by clause. Relations are build based on chained foreign keys including all the fields of the related tables, in the same order as returned by getAllFields.
        Parameters:
        orderBy - The order by index.
        Returns:
        The complex view.
